## Matrix.LerpToRef() method

Set the given matrix "result" as the interpolated values for "gradient" (float) between the ones of the matrices "startValue" and "endValue".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static LerpToRef(startValue: Matrix, endValue: Matrix, gradient: number, result: Matrix): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  startValue | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the start value |
|  endValue | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the end value |
|  gradient | <code>number</code> | defines the gradient factor |
|  result | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the Matrix object where to store data |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
